p: Innovative conservation measures are being currently proposed such like moveable and temporary reserves as well as targeted gene flow ( Reside, Butt & Adams, 2018). Resilient species to climate change are crucial for understanding genomics of climate change, assessing genes involved with the response to their future environment in view of climate change ( Rellstab et al., 2016). We suggest these measures of moveable reserves and genomics of climate change should be implemented in the Chihuahuan Desert plants.
